*WHY THIS FEATURE ?*

"Please note that if the related_blog_posts HubL tag is being used on a post, the blog_post_ids parameter should not be specified, as on blog posts, it will default to the post the widget is appearing on."

For a client I would like to get related post with the actual post but just in one blog for example on not over each blog on HubSpot...
For my mind it would be great to be able to use *blog_post_ids* even on a blog template
